problem.markdown:
1) The IS classification of soils is () Particles size classification () Textural classification () Highway research board classification (x) Modified unified classification
2) The biggest size of clay particles is () 0.0002mm (x) 0.002mm () 0.02mm () 0.075mm
3) The maximum size of fine grained soil is () 0.002mm (x) 0.075mm () 0.75mm () 4.75mm
4) Which of the following is a measure of particle size range () Effective size (x) Uniformity coefficient () Coefficient of curvature () None of the above
5) A flat grain size distribution curve shows a () Narrow range of grain size (x) Wide range of grain size () Uniform grain size () Grain size from two representative fractions
problem.p: 1) The IS classification of soils is
2) The biggest size of clay particles is
3) The maximum size of fine grained soil is
4) Which of the following is a measure of particle size range
5) A flat grain size distribution curve shows a

choicegroup.choice: Grain size from two representative fractions
